name: Create an ID badge for new G Suite Users
description: Every time a new user is added to your G Suite organization, Make will automatically create an employee badge with a QR code and dynamic data. The template uses this [example badge](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1giNIfDEVo7dwouccgxkId1Fh55u1Rc5L52MlsAitS3I/edit?usp=sharing).
